thread.title: Google is reportedly making a Chromecast for music
thread.title_full: Google is reportedly making a Chromecast for music - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Google is reportedly making a Chromecast for music
text: Google may have more than one Chromecast to show when it announces new products later this month. According to 9to5Google, Google is also working on a Chromecast that's designed for streaming music and other audio. It's apparently called Chromecast Audio, and it'll hook up to speakers through a standard 3.5mm headphone cable. Â»
